entry.title: Wednesday: Rain or snow. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with rain changing to rain this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 over exposed coastal sections late this afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Rain except wet snow inland overnight. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 over exposed coastal sections this evening. Wind becoming light late this evening then becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 after midnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Wednesday 01 March 2023
